title: Aarakocra
entryLore: A winged people originating from the Elemental Plane of Air, aarakocra soar through the sky with grace. Their ancestry ties them to the Wind Dukes of Aaqa, granting them a natural command over the elements and the ability to traverse vast distances from high above the world.

traits.name: Flight
traits.description: You have a [[speed_fly|Flying Speed]] equal to your walking speed. To use this speed, you must not be wearing medium or heavy armor.

traits.name: Talons
traits.description: You have talons that you can use to make unarmed strikes. When you hit with them, the strike deals 1d6 + your Strength modifier slashing damage, instead of the normal bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Wind Caller
traits.description: You know the [[gust|Gust]] cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast [[gust_of_wind|Gust of Wind]] once per long rest without components, and you can also cast it using any spell slots you have of 2nd level or higher.
